recipesJson.name: Staycation
recipesJson.author: robolto78
recipesJson.description:
Inspired by Mango Yo Lo Tengo by @enyawreklaw.

I wanted to create an all CAP recipe that was not only tasty off the shake, but left plenty of room for mixers to build upon. Add some pineapple, make a smoothie or both. As is, it reminds me of a drink you might have on the beach while on vacation, but with out the expenses or leaving the recliner. Hence the name Staycation. I hope you enjoy, as is or with your own touch.
